name: The Wandering
description:
'Wake up, young one. Your duty awaits. Bring the soul to the Edge where is can finally rest'. 

The Wandering is a work-in-progress puzzle adventure. There is one fully playable level at the moment, which should take approximately 30 minutes to complete.
Take care of the soul entrusted to you.  Explore the 'Cradle' — a dark and mysterious place beneath the ground, and try to find a way out.
